manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: APPLICATIONS FOR GATES MICRO-V BELTS Automotive. We’ve worked with most of the top car manufacturers in the world to produce our Micro-V belts with OE quality to fit virtually any vehicle on the road today. Gates innovative EPDM Micro-V belts are trusted by countless automotive technicians due to their quiet performance, wear-resistant construction, and tightest tolerances in the industry. APPLICATIONS FOR GATES FLEETRUNNER BELTS Fleet and Heavy-duty. FleetRunner belts are engineered to handle high mileage, high idle times and high temperatures in abusive environments. APPLICATIONS FOR GATES RPM BELTS Racing, Performance, Muscle. Advanced, exact-fit and precision-ground belt profile. Two layers of adhesion gum for maximum strength and durability. High-modulus, low stretch aramid cord. Nylon-fibre reinforced undercord. Strict OEM dimensional specifications.

DRIVEALIGN AUTOMATIC BELT TENSIONERS Gates is a global leader in Original Equipment system design and brings the same OE-quality, durability, fit and performance to our premium DriveAlign Automatic Belt Tensioners. We ensure every tensioner is manufactured to rigid tolerances and specifications with OE fit, form and function. POWERGRIP TIMING COMPONENT KITS WITH WATER PUMP (TCKWP’S) Gates Timing Component Kits with Water Pump offer customers the best and most complete repair solution by including the same premium components as our TCK’s - timing belts, pulleys and tensioners - as well as a water pump. Timing belt driven water pumps should always be replaced at the same time as the timing belt. Don’t take chances. With Gates TCKWP’s, you can avoid returns by replacing all critical system components at the same time. MOLDED COOLANT HOSE Our Molded Coolant Hoses are manufactured to fit upper, lower, bypass, heater and other coolant applications with OEM-quality specifications, saving you time, money and energy from going to your OE dealer for radiator hose replacements. Gates’ molded coolant hose line is the most comprehensive line on the replacement market. PREMIUM THERMOSTATS Gates Premium Thermostats feature a heavy gauge stainless steel construction for improved corrosion resistance, as well as an upgraded spring for increased temperature stability under normal operation conditions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality belt, stops belt squealing
reviews.reviewText: My 2015 nissan frontier with the 2.5 L 4 cylinder engine was squealing horribly. The current belt was still in good shape as far as not showing any cracks in the ribs.However, this belt has a textured "woven" look to the flat side of the belt, and the water pump immediately stopped squealing after installing this belt. (The water pump is driven by the flat side of the belt)Gates is the brand to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the exact same replacement that sells at Napa for almost twice the price. Fit and quality is the same. Last one changed after 85k but like to be proactive and change at 60k regardless of wear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2013
reviews.reviewText: It appears to be a decent replacement belt. The quality seems good and the price was fair. It fit perfect and I have no complaints, so no stars lost.Helpful Note: After dealing with this type of belt many times, I finally found a trick that makes it easier to install. Leave the belt incorrectly looped on the top of the idler pulley. Pull back the tensioner to loop the belt around the alternator pulley. Lastly, pull back the tensioner back again to move the belt from the top of the idler pulley to the underside. It is much easier to install in stages like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars An OEM belt is a superior part.... duh.
reviews.reviewText: At first this belt seemed ok. After being on the car a couple weeks I noticed a slight rhythmic squeak on startup I didn't even associate with the belt immediately, though I should have known.A few days later it start SCREEEAAAMING at anything above idle and made no difference if I used belt dressing. I honestly thought I had a seizing pulley. I even thought I had it narrowed down to the alternator since it squeaked slightly when I had no belt on.Well ... I put the 70k mile OEM subaru belt back on and wonderful SILENCE (other than normal engine noises). It's been 3 weeks since I put the OEM belt back and it's still silent and perfect. I thought I should replace the belt after so many miles but... I guess I should just not with one of these.As always your experience may vary but I had a really annoying and embarrassing drive home from an hour away the day the gates belt finally began slipping badly. Everybody stared like I was obviously a moron driving a POS.I am lucky it was still running the water pump and alternator enough not to overheat or kill the battery. Sad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, fast delivery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If your going to get the belt, make it a Gates.
reviews.reviewText: Theses belts will out live this car. I've never had a problem with Gates products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2014
reviews.reviewText: No problems. Matched up fine to my '04 Taurus and installed without any issues. Even needed to take a 600 mile road trip right after installation and felt confident to have a new belt on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2018
